description:
This market asks whether the show 'Servant of the People', a Ukrainian political satire that featured Volodymyr Zelenskyy acting the role of 'President of Ukraine', will be on the weekly Netflix Global Top 10 list for either 'TV (English)' or TV (Non-English)' by May 1, 2022. The show is currently available for the US audience at https://www.netflix.com/title/80119382. 

The resolution source will be the official statistics portal of Netflix (https://top10.netflix.com/), under 'Global Top 10' for the weeks ending on dates between March 20 and May 1 (inclusive). Both 'TV (English)' and 'TV (Non-English)' top 10 lists will be checked.

If 'Servant of the People' appears on the Netflix Global Top 10 for either the 'TV (English)' or 'TV (Non-English)' lists, for weeks ending on dates between March 20, 2022, and May 1, 2022 (inclusive), this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source (https://top10.netflix.com/tv) will be checked daily at 12 PM ET, and finally on May 2, 12 PM ET. If the resolution data is unavailable on this final check, the source will be checked every 24 hours until the data is available, and the most recent data will be used to resolve the market. If two weeks later the data is still unavailable, this market resolves 50/50.

markets.question: Will Zelenskyy's show 'Servant of the People' be in the weekly Netflix Global Top 10 list by May 1?

title: Will Zelenskyy's show 'Servant of the People' be in the weekly Netflix Global Top 10 list by May 1?
